questions.question: Put a small quantity of sugar ………………… the batter.
questions.description: Into is common after put to talk about directional movement.

questions.question: My quarrel is ……………………. the under-representation of women here.
A quarter of the population voted …………………… him.
questions.description: You vote for or against somebody.

questions.question: The restaurant offered us a quasi hamburger made ……………………. vegetables.
questions.description: Made is used with of when we identify the material used to make something.

questions.question: Direct all queries ……………………… your nearest dealer.
The police queried him ……………………….. his whereabouts the night of the crime.
Iced tea will quench your thirst ……………………… hot days.
The salesman pushed the product ………………………… every opportunity.
The people shivered ………………………. fear when their village was invaded.
questions.description: With is used in a number of expressions like shiver with, tremble with etc.

questions.question: She has a quality of kindness that appeals ……………………………. everyone.
Only applicants ………………………… the proper qualifications will be considered.
He had no qualms ………………………… robbing the poor.
